special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom, and it has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): command, shield of faith
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): command, shield of faith

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
